#summary Automatic word completion and next word suggestion function.

= Introduction =

Automatic word completion and next word suggestion function.


= Initial database content =
The database will be initially filled with the words in the files below
 * "basiswoorden_OpenTaal_110G.txt" (with wordCnt = -1, so these words are only used after typed one time manually)
 * "Joost_woorden.xls" (with wordCnt = 0)
 * "1000_basiswoorden_wiki.txt" (with wordCnt = 0)
 * "basiswoorden_adam.xls" (with wordCnt = 0)                                  
The last 2 files are used so the auto completion feature is functional directly after installation of the ProMo
